briefTitle: Sarizotan in Participants With Parkinson's Disease Suffering From Treatment Associated Dyskinesia
officialTitle: A Double-Blind, Placebo-Controlled, Multicenter, Multinational Phase III Study to Evaluate the Safety and Efficacy of Sarizotan in Patients With Parkinson's Disease Suffering From Treatment-Associated Dyskinesia
summary: The purpose of this study is to test multiple doses of sarizotan to establish a dose with maximal safety and efficacy for treating treatment associated dyskinesia in Parkinson's disease participants.

primaryOutcome.measure: Change From Baseline in Diary-Based On-Time Without Dyskinesia at Week 12
